title: Kanmoodi Thirakumbothu Song Lyrics Sachein
stanzas:
Kanmoodi thirakkum podhu
kadavul edhire vandhathu pole
ada en kanmundaadi
avale vandhu nindraale

kudaiyillaa neram paarthu
kotti pogum mazhaiyai pola
azhagaale ennai nenaithu
idhuthaan kadhal endraale

therumunaiyai thaandum varaiyil
verumnaal thaan endrundhen
thevadhayai paarthadhum indru
thirunaal enkindren

azhagaana vibathil indru
ayyo naan maatikonden
thappikka vazhigal irundhum
vendaam endren
o ho ho o o ho ho...

un perum theriyaadhu
un oorum theriaadhu
azhagaana paravaikku
per vendumaa

nee ennai paarkkaamal
naan unnai paarkindren
nadhiyil vilum bimpathai
nilaa ariyumaa

uyirukkul innoru uyirai
sumakindren kadhal idhuvaa
idhayathil malaiyin edaiyai
unargindren kadhal idhuvaa

veedhi ulaa nee vandhaal
theru vilakkum kannadikkum
veedu sells sooriyanum
adam pidikkume

nadhiyodu nee kulithaal
meenukkum kaaichal varum
unnai thottu paarkathaan
mazhai kuthikkume

boogambam vandhaal kooda
patharaatha nenjam enadhu
poo ondru modhiyathaale
pattendru sarinthadhu indru

Kanmoodi thirakkum podhu
kadavul edhire vandhathu pole
ada en kanmundaadi
avale vandhu nindraale

kudaiyillaa neram paarthu
kotti pogum mazhaiyai pola
azhagaale ennai nenaithu
idhuthaan kadhal endraale
